mention.text: the economic policies announced by China 's communist leaders
the general support of the Hong Kong people
the support of the people of Hong Kong
Such a head-to-head contest between Beijing
many of their business and political leaders
The airport and its associated infrastructure projects
the Legislative Council -LRB- LegCo -RRB- on Saturday
they who will have to pass any legislation drawn up to provide for the forthcoming elections
the economic well-being of its people in response
